Uses of Class
it.unibz.inf.be.Item

Packages that use Item
Package Description
it.unibz.inf.bl
Classes implementing the business logic of the entire application.
The methods in these classes are called by views and access the model to modify or query it
it.unibz.inf.model
Model classes, holding the state of the application at runtime

  • Uses of Item in it.unibz.inf.bl

    Methods in it.unibz.inf.bl that return Item
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Item ItemManager.createItem​(int sellerID, java.lang.String categoryID, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String bidIncrement)
    Creates an item with given properties and adds it to the model
    static Item ItemManager.deleteItem​(int itemID)
    Deletes the item with given ID
    static Item ItemManager.modifyItem​(int itemID, java.lang.String categoryID, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String bidIncrement)
    Modifies an item with given ID by setting new values to its attributes
    static Item ItemManager.selectItem​(int sellerID, java.lang.String itemID)
    Selects an item with given ID
    Methods in it.unibz.inf.bl that return types with arguments of type Item
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.List<Item> AuctionManager.searchBiddedItems​(int userID)
    Searches for the list of items the user with given ID has placed a bid on
    static java.util.List<Item> ItemManager.showItemsForSeller​(int sellerID)
    Gets all items inserted by a seller
    static java.util.List<Item> AuctionManager.trackBiddedItems​(int userID)
    Searches for the list of items the user with given ID has placed a bid on
